name: best bandana
notes:
this bandana is for your best boy or girl. make this stylish accessory for all occasions, whether curled up with you at home, or out showing off on your next adventure.

**skill**
crochet

**difficulty**
easy

**sizes**
small (large)

**finished measurements**
width (excluding strap): 7 (15)”
depth at center: 4 (7)”

**materials**
universal yarn uptown worsted (100% anti-pilling acrylic; 100g/180 yds)
large size (pictured on peggy, left)
• 338 living green – 1 ball (all sizes)
small size (pictured on leeloo, pg. 2)
• 339 purple panic – 1 ball (all sizes)
hook: us size h/8 (5 mm) or size needed to obtain gauge
notions: tapestry needle

**gauge**
18 sts x 8 rows = 4” in bandana patt
save time, check your gauge.

**pattern notes**
this bandana is worked flat from the top down. if you wish to make the bandana smaller or larger than the suggested sizes, simply work less or more rows in the established pattern. if you wish to make the strap shorter or longer, simply work less or more starting chains in the bandana strap section.

to style this bandana, wrap it around your dogs neck like a collar. thread the strap through the chain-5 loop, then tie the strap into a simple knot around the loop.
